messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Re:
messages.msgSnippet: i have only been homeschooling for about 3 months, and i have never once heard of anyone who doesn t expect some things from their child! as far as health
messages.messageBody:
i have only been homeschooling for about 3 months, and i have never once
heard of anyone who doesn't expect some things from their child! as far as
health concerns, i have been diabetic for 24 years. i know for certain no one
lets their child take total responsibilty for such a serious condition( i
don't like to refer to it as an illness, diease, etc.). that would be a
deadly choice to make! however helping the child to comes to terms with his
condition, and could also be incorperated into a science and health lesson
while helping to child take control, which is very important for him to get
along happy and healthy in this world. you can find kids that are unschooled
or homeschooled whichever you prefer learning lots from the world around us
as well as in their own bodies.i'm not trying to be preachy but i think more
info. should be gathered before making an assumption such as this one.
tina
